headline: Nutanix (NTNX) Tops Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Nutanix (NTNX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 10.53% and 2.06%, respectively, for the quarter ended April 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Nutanix (NTNX) Tops Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
raw.summary: Nutanix (NTNX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 10.53% and 2.06%, respectively, for the quarter ended April 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: LGI: Decent But Imperfect Way To Play The Strength In Foreign Markets
summary: LGI offers high income (10.86% yield) and global equity exposure, appealing to income-focused investors seeking better yields than major indices or bonds. Read the full CEF analysis here.

headline: David Droga is stepping down as CEO of Accenture Song
summary: “I am ready to catch my breath,” the award-winning advertising executive said. He will transition to a strategic role in September.

raw.headline: David Droga is stepping down as CEO of Accenture Song
raw.summary: “I am ready to catch my breath,” the award-winning advertising executive said. He will transition to a strategic role in September.

headline: Droga Steps Down as CEO of Accenture Song, the Marketing Unit He Helped Build at Consulting Giant
summary: David Droga’s sale of his namesake agency to Accenture in 2019 gave momentum to consultancies’ move into marketing services.

raw.headline: Droga Steps Down as CEO of Accenture Song, the Marketing Unit He Helped Build at Consulting Giant
raw.summary: David Droga’s sale of his namesake agency to Accenture in 2019 gave momentum to consultancies’ move into marketing services.

headline: David Droga to Step Down as Accenture Song CEO, Appointed Accenture Vice Chair
summary: NEW YORK, May 28, 2025--Accenture today announced that chief executive officer of Accenture Song, David Droga, has chosen to step down from day-to-day leadership.

raw.headline: David Droga to Step Down as Accenture Song CEO, Appointed Accenture Vice Chair
raw.summary: NEW YORK, May 28, 2025--Accenture today announced that chief executive officer of Accenture Song, David Droga, has chosen to step down from day-to-day leadership.

headline: Droga departs Accenture Song CEO post at fluid moment for creativity
summary: The decision marks the close of a chapter for an industry trailblazer whose agency, Droga5, was the cornerstone of Accenture’s bet on creativity.

raw.headline: Droga departs Accenture Song CEO post at fluid moment for creativity
